clues.clue: Prohibition was repealed in this year, the first year of FDR's first term

clues.clue: The New York Mets beat the Baltimore Orioles to take their first World Series in this year

clues.category: IT WAS A VERY GOOD YEAR
clues.clue: Cheering crowds met Allied troops liberating Rome from the Axis Powers in this year

clues.category: IT WAS A VERY GOOD YEAR
clues.clue: We hadn't heard anything yet when Al Jolson sang & spoke in "The Jazz Singer", a talkie released way back in this year

clues.category: IT WAS A VERY GOOD YEAR
clues.clue: Roald Amundsen first reached the South Pole late in this year

The first names of 2 of Frank's 4 wives

The Michigan city where he set up his law practice, before his political career
The man he succeeded as vice president

From the Latin for "invite", it's to strive in competition, as for a title
